reviews.review: I have learned the errors of my way. This game... is sexy.
this game has done a pretty good job!

Generally, the game itself is able to beat records of popularity, but in my opinion it's the community that is making the game unplayable (not mentioning the ranking system). Once you hit the "16 rank barrier" the only thing you can meet in your games are camping and tunneling killers when you're playing the survivor, and toxic, flashlight clicking, high-rank survivors as a killer. This way, the game is unplayable. Anyways the mechanics are really good. Things to improve in my opinon are latency of servers, and Killers hitboxes (or at least animation to make it look like a hit). If not the trash killers, the game would be perfect. I love DBD's character leveling system btw.

Great game! I love it! I really recommend it!
Edit after 1,029 hrs: I still love the game and it's better than ever. But you have to be reaaally patient if you wanna get this game. Que times can be as long as 10 minutes or sometimes like 5 seconds. Also, the games really unforgiving to new players and the grind is soooooo long. But once you get into it, You'll never want to leave. Edit after 2,269 hrs: AHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHH. Edit after 3,215 hrs: üëç 4,154 hrs: üëç

I play this game as an adrenaline exercise.

Tbh its 1 killer Vs 4 survivor, but feels like this game is solely made for survivor, because no matter strategy you're using as killer, you'll never make the Survivors happy. Yet, it's relatively fun and challenging to play if you just put aside ranks, hatred and anger. The Devs seems pretty promising, making this game more balanced. 

Spoiler alert: The community is toxic
Personal Rating: 7/10

Eu particularmente sou apaixonado em jogos de terror, principalmente quando o sobrevivente √© incapaz de revidar contra o assassino, monstro, etc. E Dead By Daylight junta tr√™s coisas que amo: Furtividade, Adrenalina e Terror. Recomendo muito que compre esse jogo, mas claro sempre d√™ uma olhada em gameplays do jogo antes de compr√°-lo.

(This review used to be in favor of the game but the edit at the bottom will explain why it's been changed to not recommend the game.)
Since the addition of games being cancelled if people disconnect, the game has been on an uphill climb. The number of perks/killers and survivors with the promise of more leaves me to only write a good review for this game. They also recently added The Archives with gives more reason to play the game, more ways to earn bloodpoints, free cosmetics and even more so if you buy the decently cheap premium pass which also allows you to earn back what you paid in auric cell (the in-game currency).

Although that isn't to say the game isn't without it's problems. Killer queue times at certain ranks and certain times of day can be dreadful. The learning curve is rough without going to outside sources to learn the game (I recommend Otzdarva for those who wish to learn killer) and there isn't very much skill to be had in playing survivor, mostly game sense. The newly added dedicated servers are still a little crusty. About 3 killers being the Doctor, the Pig, and the Clown are all very low tier killers who require specific perks to slow down the game if you don't want to get gen-rushed which will happen either way.

If you haven't tried the game with the constant free weekends, I suggest you try it next time and if it's on sale it's almost a must buy. Just one thing, prepare for salt as with any competitive multiplayer game.

EDIT: Since the addition of the archives, most people don't play the game properly now and instead only focus on their current challenge. As killer, you're gonna have some easy games where people don't try and you get all the time in the world to chase survivors. As survivor, you get those said teammates who are only just trying to complete their challenge and sometimes killers doing the same thing resulting in a game where he plays unfairly and not participating in normal gameplay.

The archives are ruining the game quite a bit especially at lower ranks since inexperienced players tend to have no care on how they play. I don't expect them to change it or not do another one because it's profitable but the only that will change my mind is if they go through and buff useless perks and give buffs/changes to weaker killers. For now this has been changed to a negative review

Entretenido, bueno para jugar con amigos.
Had fun playing this game, especially with my friends.

Soon this game will be 3 years old and the devs are still putting their efforts to improve the gaming experience by reworking the original boring element like DS and adding new content to spice up the game. Despite the toxicity of the community, I still recommend this game as it is fun and challenging to play if you just put aside ranks, hatred and anger. 

Enjoy the game, good luck and have fun.
